title: STOP using your ISP provided router! - ASUS RT-AX86U AX5700 WiFi 6 Router Showcase
description: Thanks to ASUS for sponsoring this video! The giveaway has ended, but you can buy this router on Amazon (PAID LINK) at   It's been a wee bit since we unboxed a router at Linus Media Group, but it's fairly important to your home networking, especially if you're still using your ISP-provided router.
